Class RemoteNXTMotorPort

All Implemented Interfaces:

public class RemoteNXTMotorPort
extends RemoteNXTIOPort
implements NXTProtocol, TachoMotorPort

Abstraction for an EV3 output port. TODO: Sort out a better way to do this, or least clean up the magic numbers.
